ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisRe-appointment of KELLY HARVEY RUSS of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a part-time member of the Canadian Human Rights Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 24, 2004.
